mama dambaadiwa wandana karanna kalaka patanma aasawen hitapu kenek.horana thakshila widyalaye natya ha rangakala guruwaraya wana ashoka karunarathna nisa pasugiyada ee awasthawa saba karaganna mata awasthawa labuna.budu hamuduruwo upan ee bimata giyama mage hithata puduma tharame sha්raddhawak bhakthiyak athiwuna.awuruddakata wathawakwath mata me puja bhumiya wanda puda ganna thibenawa nam kiyala hithuna.oya atharema apith ekka wandanawe giya boho wayasaka udawiyata udaw karannan mata awasthawa labuna.

pahala dompe pradeshaye pirimi lama niwasayakata danata sathi dekakata pamana ihathadi pariwasa karyalayakin bhara dun dasa hawiridi pirimi daruwaku gela walalagena siyadiwi hanikara gena atha.mese miyagiye kaluthara palathota pradeshaye padinchi daruweki.mema daruwa kaluthara mahesthrath adhikaranaya magin lama niwasayakata bhara di sitiyadi in dewathawakma pana gos athi athara inpasu ohu mema lama niwasayata bharadi thibini.ohu manasika aabadhayakin pelunu ayeku wana bawada kiyawe.pasugiya sanduda (29 wanida) sawasa 2.00 ta pamana mema lama niwasaye lamun krida kirima sandaha kridapitiyata ragena gos siti awasthawe mema daruwa hora rahase lama niwasayata pamina mese siyadiwi hanikara gena thibe.me athara pugoda wadabalana mahesthrath di. ee. gunasekara mahatha wisin siddhiya wu sthanayata pamina mahesthrath parikshanaya pawathwa ema mala sirura pashchath marana parikshanaya pawathwima sandaha gampaha rohalata yawimata niyoga keleya.dompe polis sthanadhipathi polis parikshaka prabhath parana withana mahatha me pilibandawa wadidura parikshana meheyawayi..
